name: Gem Collapse
description:
Fast paced block busting fun in this action packed game! Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the blocks overpower you. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

* Three addictive modes; Frenzy, Panic and Collapse.
* Daily bonus.
* Multiple tile sets.
* Awesome power ups.
* Easy to learn, yet hard to master.
* Climb the leader board and share your success with your friends on Facebook.

GAME PLAY

PANIC MODE

Fast and furious is the name of the game. Speed Demons, Block Storms, Frozen Blocks and the occasional Virus will all conspire to hinder your progress! Fear not, help is at hand in the form of volatile bolts of energy, which will violently strike down from the heavens above, destroying a random number of blocks on the board.

FRENZY MODE

Now is your chance to get a whole bunch of goodies! Lucky stars, magic keys and frozen power ups will all appear in the feeder. You've got 60 seconds to grab as much as you can … but it wont be an easy ride. Every second the feeder will speed up and pile on the pressure - just don't flunk it!

COLLAPSE MODE

This is classic Collapse at its best. Sit back, unwind and enjoy a relaxing game of block busting fun!
